entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
